<title level="1" right="Focus 3" pfs="Standard">
[Swamp of Sloth](/Spells.aspx?ID=2097)
<actions string="Single Action to Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=645" />
<trait label="Olfactory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=664" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 263 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Bloodline**
[Demonic](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=21)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Area** 5-foot burst or more

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
[basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=2297) Fortitude

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

Ground in the area turns swampy and fetid. The area is [difficult terrain](/Rules.aspx?ID=453). The sludge at the bottom of the morass animates into diminutive sludge beasts that have a demonic appearance. These don't function as normal creatures, but they swarm over creatures in the swamp and exude a noxious stench. The swamp deals 1d6 poison damage to creatures that end their turn in the area ([basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save). For each additional action you use when Casting the Spell, increase the burst's radius by 5 feet.

---
**Heightened (+2)** The damage increases by 1d6, and the initial radius increases by 5 feet.
name: Swamp of Sloth
